snippet: There is reason for health authorities to remain hypervigilant but no reason for anyone other than travelers to China to take precautions.
abstract: Editorial assesses threat posed by deadly new bird flu virus known as H7N9, which has infected more than 60 people in China; contends there is plenty of reason for health authorities to remain hypervigilant, but notes that there is no reason for anyone other than travelers to China to take precautions.
lead_paragraph: There is reason for health authorities to remain hypervigilant but no reason for anyone other than travelers to China to take precautions.

headline.seo: Another Bird Flu Outbreak in China
